message: Let's split fairly, considering the inflation!
Your offer was a good starting point, but let's make it a little more equitable considering the inflation is hitting me harder.
Considering the inflation difference, I'll meet you halfway from my initial offer.
I appreciate you moving closer to the middle ground. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers to reach a deal quickly.

Time is running out, and the inflation is eating away at any potential gains. This is my final offer - let's be reasonable and close this deal.
